insights.title: Strong ChatGPT Presence
insights.description: Your brand appears in 68% of relevant ChatGPT responses. ChatGPT synthesizes from its training data, where your comprehensive blog content and industry mentions have established presence.

modelContext.whyThisHappens: ChatGPT learned about your brand from widespread content across the web during training. Unlike search engines, it doesn't check real-time rankings—it recalls patterns from training.
modelContext.concreteExample: When users ask 'What tools help with AI SEO?', ChatGPT mentions your brand because it encountered your content and brand mentions in its training corpus.
modelContext.actionableStep: Maintain content velocity. Create thought leadership pieces that get cited by other publications to reinforce brand recall in future model training.

insights.title: Growing Perplexity Citations
insights.description: Perplexity cites your content as a source in 45% of industry queries, up from 28% last month. Your structured, fact-dense content is ideal for Perplexity's citation-first approach.

modelContext.whyThisHappens: Perplexity searches the web in real-time and ALWAYS provides citations. Your content with clear statistics, methodologies, and quotable facts gets picked up as citable sources.
modelContext.concreteExample: For 'How do AI models perceive brands?', Perplexity cited your methodology article with [1] because it contained specific, attributable information.
modelContext.actionableStep: Add more original research with specific numbers. Create 'X% of brands...' style statistics that Perplexity can quote directly with attribution.

insights.title: Weak Gemini Visibility
insights.description: Your brand only appears in 23% of Gemini responses, significantly lagging competitors. Gemini's real-time Google integration favors brands with strong technical SEO.

modelContext.whyThisHappens: Gemini combines AI with live Google Search. It heavily weights structured data (Schema.org), Google Business Profile, and traditional SERP signals. Your technical SEO gaps hurt here.
modelContext.concreteExample: When asked 'Best AI visibility tools?', Gemini pulls from Google's entity database. Competitors with Organization schema and Knowledge Panels appear; you don't.
modelContext.actionableStep: Implement comprehensive Schema.org markup (Organization, Product, FAQ). This directly feeds Gemini's entity understanding and improves visibility within 2-4 weeks.

modelComparison.summary: ChatGPT favors your content depth, Perplexity loves your citable facts, but Gemini can't 'see' you properly due to missing structured data.
modelComparison.unifiedStrategy: Add Schema.org markup to existing content—this helps Gemini immediately while also making your content more parseable for all AI models.

issues.impact: Missing significant traffic from Google's AI search features
issues.technicalDetail: No Organization or Product schema detected. Gemini relies on Google's entity understanding.

issues.impact: AI models are citing outdated pricing and features from 2023
issues.technicalDetail: ChatGPT and Claude have training cutoffs. Your frequently-changing content (pricing, features) shows stale data.

issues.impact: Despite strong tutorials, AI rarely cites your how-to guides
issues.technicalDetail: Tutorial content lacks step-by-step structure and FAQ schema that AI models parse easily.

recommendations.title: Implement Schema.org Markup for Gemini
recommendations.action: Add Organization, Product, and FAQ schema to key pages. This directly feeds into Gemini's entity understanding.

recommendations.title: Create Quotable Original Research
recommendations.action: Publish 'State of AI Visibility' report with specific statistics. Perplexity will cite these numbers directly.
recommendations.expectedImprovement: +20% Perplexity citations, ripple effect to other models

recommendations.title: Update Key Information Pages
recommendations.action: Ensure pricing, features, and company info are current and prominently structured. Add 'Last updated' dates.

recommendations.title: Restructure Tutorial Content
recommendations.action: Add clear step numbers, summaries at top, and HowTo schema to tutorial content.
recommendations.expectedImprovement: +10% visibility in how-to queries across all models
